entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
